MessageConfiguration.mobileMessageText: There is a hazardous situation on our floor.Please mark if you are safe by sending reply YES/Y, otherwise send us an SOS message so we can Rescue you as soon as possible.
MessageConfiguration.RescueMessageText: Our one of Employee {Name} in your {DependentLocality} area is in emergency.Below are contact details {PhoneNumber} and https://www.google.com/maps/?q={Latitude},{Longitude}
